test_cases.name: Drought-tolerant plant hormone producer
test_cases.description: I want to develop a microbial strain/consortium that is root-associated, drought tolerant, and produces a targeted plant hormone and an antifungal compound.

test_cases.name: Biofuel-producing yeast optimization
test_cases.description: Optimize a yeast strain for enhanced fatty acid production for biofuel applications. Need to identify rate-limiting enzymes and engineer them for higher activity.

test_cases.name: Nitrogen fixation in non-legumes
test_cases.description: Engineer a bacterial strain that can fix nitrogen and associate with grass roots (switchgrass) to reduce fertilizer requirements.

test_cases.name: Lignin degradation for biomass processing
test_cases.description: Identify and characterize microbial enzymes for efficient lignin degradation to improve biomass deconstruction for renewable chemicals.

test_cases.name: Stress-tolerant poplar microbiome
test_cases.description: Characterize the poplar root microbiome under drought stress and identify beneficial microbes for plant growth promotion.

test_cases.name: CRISPR strain library construction
test_cases.description: Build a CRISPR knockout library in Pseudomonas for systematic gene function analysis related to plant root colonization.

test_cases.name: Terpenoid biosynthesis pathway
test_cases.description: Engineer E. coli to produce a novel terpenoid compound for agricultural applications. Need to identify bottleneck enzymes and optimize the pathway.

test_cases.name: Cellulase optimization
test_cases.description: Improve cellulase enzymes from thermophilic fungi for industrial biomass processing at high temperatures.

test_cases.name: Phosphate solubilization microbes
test_cases.description: Screen and engineer microbes that can solubilize phosphate in soil to improve nutrient availability for crops.

test_cases.name: Antimicrobial peptide production
test_cases.description: Develop a microbial production platform for antimicrobial peptides to protect crops from fungal pathogens.
